reviewText: Skip BizR approved ..must have for all
This bluray is wonderful the clarity of this movie is great!
A great movie we watch every year. Decided to try the Blu Ray version. I'm not sure if there is something special about this version but it seems very overpriced.
I love this movie! It's great as the book. This is the movie you would enjoy watching, even at Christmas, and it will make a perfect Christmas gift.
Thanks Polar Express arrived when promised and was in perfect condition. Couldn't get any better.
